DataKitDeployEvent.name: DataKitDeployEvent
DataKitDeployEvent.description: Represents a data kit deployment event that notifies subscribers of the status of the data kit component deployment. This object is available in API version 61.0 or later.

DataKitDeployStatus.description: The deployment status of the components deployed from a data kit. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later. Possible values are: Active Deleting Error Inactive Processing

DataKitName.description: Name of the data kit from which a component is deployed.

DataspaceName.description: Name of the data space into which a component is deployed.

DeployStartTime.description: The date and time the deployment starts.

EventCreationDate.description: The date and time the data kit deploy creation event was created.

EventPublishDate.description: The date and time of the data kit deploy publish event.

EventUuid.description: The unique ID of the event.

IsDataKitDeployStatusSuccess.description: Status of the data kit component deployment. Possible values are: Active Failure

JobIdentifier.description: Data kit component deployment job identifier.

ReplayId.description: The ID of the data kit deploy event replay.

TemplateName.description: The template name from which the data kit deploy event is created.
